title: Moussaka
description: The famous greek salad of crispy lettuce, peppers, olives and our Chicago style feta cheese, garnished with crunchy garlic and rosemary croutons.

title: Greek Gods Salad
description: The Greek salad traditionally combines chopped tomato, cucumber, bell pepper, and olives, fresh from the ground or markets.

title: Baklava
description: Baklava is an utterly divine and multi-textured pastry dessert, originating from Turkey during the Ottoman Empire’s rule.

title: Borek
description: Borek is traditionally made with filo or yufka pastry. It’s baked in a large pan and then cut into slices once ready. Its name is believed to be derived from the Turkish word bur, ‘to twist’.
